data.title: Race Week Info Center
data.meta_description: At Rock 'n' Roll Las Vegas, you get to run The Strip at night in the entertainment capital of the world — where everything is bigger and brighter.
data.text:
^ Adding Translated Content

In the text block above, use these options as needed:

中文 (Chinese)

English

Español

Français

German

Italiano

Filipino

Copy the layout container with original content. The layout container must have a custom class. See below for the custom classes needed for this page (CSS must match exactly):

lng-中文chinese

lng-english

lng-español

lng-français

lng-german

lng-italiano

lng-filipino

Proceed to edit the page elements and replace copy with the updated language.

^ Changing Distances

This table populates the available distances on the race page and its subpages. The distances listed should match what's displayed on the race card. The distances on the race page and its subpages as well as the race card are managed by Webmasters. Please submit your distance changes to them.

^ Updating Register Button

This registration link should match the Race Registration Status on the race card. Both are managed by Webmasters. Please submit your updated status and registration link targets to them.

The link title should only be one of the following:

Coming Soon

Register Now

Get Notified

Sold Out

PRESALE

Discontinued

Closed

Postponed

Rescheduled

EXPO

To set the default language for this race page and its sub pages, there can only be one default language. If a default language is not needed for a race, this container can be deleted from the top template.

The language must adhere to the special characters, similar to the "Select Language" dropdown (i.e. français.)

The race page must have the default language in the "Select Language" dropdown AND there must be layout containers with custom classes on them.

Gear Check

Gear check will be available for anyone wishing to checking items during the race. On race day, please affix your gear check tag (on your bib number) to your clear gear bag before you leave it at the table assigned to your last name. DO NOT leave valuables, cash or jewelry in your bag. Please note, due to security for Gear Check, there may be lines. You will pick up your checked items after the race.

Saturday 5K Stationary Gear Check:

Stationary Gear Check will be located outside Downtown Las Vegas Events Center in a parking lot on 3rd Street. Gear check will be open from 3:00PM until 9:00PM. Please review the Saturday 5K Start & Finish Venue Map.

Sunday Half Marathon & 10K Gear Check:

We're excited to be partnering with UPS for the 2024 Rock 'n' Roll Running Series Las Vegas Gear Check program. Look for the UPS Delivery Trucks near the Start Line and Finish Line.

Drop Off: Las Vegas Blvd outside Park MGM. Gear Trucks close at 4:15pm to go to the finish line. Please be sure to drop off your gear before 4:15pm.

Pick Up: Las Vegas Blvd at The Cosmopolitan. Gear Check closes at 10:30pm
